headline: Why Mastercard Incorporated (MA) Is One of The Most Held Stocks by Hedge Funds
summary: We recently published a list of 12 Stocks Most Held by Hedge Funds. In this article, we are going to look at where Mastercard Incorporated (NYSE:MA) stands against other most held stocks by hedge funds. On December 12, President-elect Donald Trump rang the opening bell at the New York Stock Exchange, an event rich with symbolism […]

headline: Will Mastercard (MA) Benefit from Global Payments Digitization?
